--- In gladiator@y..., "oldschool518" <johnnyoldschool@e...> wrote:
> happy birthday dude!

Thank you.  And because I'm in a good mood, I'll tell you how old I 
am.  Take the sum of the digits of the year of my birth and add 1 to 
that number.  That's my age.  For those not mathematically inclined, 
guess-and-check method works.
